title: FITWAY
description: FITWAY is a powerful mobile application for gym routine management with an intuitive and customizable interface. Users can create routines tailored to their goals by selecting exercises and setting repetitions, sets, and rest periods.

title: Flex movies center
description: Project Full stack created using ReactJS for the frontend and NodeJS with MySQL for the backend, utilizing the TMDB API. Features include user login and registration, as well as the ability to add movies to favorites. Complete RESTful API implementation.

title: Apple-Concept Ecomerce
description: Apple-inspired ecommerce, developed upon completing the ReactJS course at CODERHOUSE. Fusing creativity and design, I crafted an original user experience. Firebase served as the database.

title: React Native ToDo App
description: A To-Do app is designed to help users manage tasks and schedules. It enables task list creation, priority setting, task completion tracking, and can include additional features like reminders, due dates, and notes. This app was developed on group.

title: LENO Ecomerce
description: Project crafted as the culmination of a Javascript course at CODERHOUSE. Demonstrating my expertise in design and development, every aspect of this creation is wholly original.
